name: Channel Forward
description: A script to forward large number of files to another telegram channel

API_ID.description: Get API_KEY from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

TO_CHANNEL_ID.description: To which channel/group you want to forward files. Enter channel ID

STRING_SESSION.description: Get your telethon string session from here https://replit.com/@AnjanaMadu/GenerateStringSession

FILE_TYPE.description: Enter file type you want to forward. (Files types = docs, music, videos, photos.)

CUSTOM_CAPTION.description: If you want to add custom thumbnail. You should read ReadMe.

FROM_CHANNEL_ID.description: From which channel/group you want to forward files. Enter channel ID
